name: Timeseries of spherical harmonic expansion coefficients of the large-scale magnetospheric field
description: Timeseries of spherical harmonic expansion coefficients of the large-scale magnetospheric field and its Earth-induced counterpart derived in Dedicated Inversion chain. This is a fast-track product which is provided without an independent regular validation
